		    'pageType': "other",
		    'pageCategory': [],
		    'visitorLoginState': 'Anonymous',
					});

<script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
        var timeout;

		$('.block-suggester-container').on('click',function(e){

			e.stopPropagation();

        });

        $('.block-suggester-container .suggester input[type=text]').keyup(function(){
            var self = $(this);

            if(timeout) clearTimeout(timeout);

            timeout = setTimeout(function(){
                $.nette.ajax({
                    url: "https:\/\/www.kosik.cz\/silvestr-na-kosiku?do=suggester-suggest",
                    data: {
                        phrase: self.val()
                    }
                })
            }, 300);


        });

    });

    function gaPush(self, cat)
    {
        dataLayer.push({
            'event': 'ga.pageview',
            'pagePath': '/hledat?q='+$('#frm-suggester-suggester-phrase').val()+'&cat='+cat,
            'pageTitle': 'Našeptávač'
        });

        window.location = self.href;
    }
</script>
<div class="block block-suggester-container" role="search">
    <div class="suggester">
        <form action="/silvestr-na-kosiku" method="post" id="frm-suggester-suggester" aria-label="vyhledávání na košíku">
            <input type="text" name="phrase" autocomplete="off" placeholder="Vyhledávání" id="frm-suggester-suggester-phrase">
            <input type="submit" name="_submit" value="Hledat" class="button-simple button-red">
        <input type="hidden" name="do" value="suggester-suggester-submit"><!--[if IE]><input type=IEbug disabled style="display:none"><![endif]-->
</form>

    </div>
<div id="snippet-suggester-suggestionResult"></div></div>
<script type="text/javascript" async>
    var ShoppingList = {
        toggle: function () {
            basic.toggleClass(document.getElementById('shopping-list-overlay'), 'active')
        }
    };

    basic.documentReady(function () {

        var textArea = document.getElementById('frm-shoppingList-listForm-queries');

        if (textArea)
            textArea.setAttribute('placeholder', 'Například: \n\nMléko \nChléb \nVejce \nMaso \nRajče \n\n\nPro zadání klikněte do pole')
    });

</script>

        <span class="navigation-mobile"></span>
        <script>
            $(document).ready(function () {
                $('.region-navigation ul > li.sub').hover(function () {
                    var isOpen = $(this).data().open;

                    if (!isOpen) {
                        var images = $(this).find('img');

                        images.each(function (index, element) {
                            $(element).attr('src', $(element).data().src);
                        });

                        $(this).data().open = true;
                    }
                });
            });
        </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(function() {
        $('.christmas-link').on('click', function () {
            if (window.innerWidth < 1025) {
                var mobileMenu = $('#big-menu');
                mobileMenu.toggleClass('open');
                basic.toggleClass((document.querySelector('body')), 'open-menu');
            }
            $('html, body').animate({
                scrollTop: $('#christmas-inspiration').offset().top - 100
            }, 2000);
            return false;
        });

    });
</script>

    $(document).ready(function(){
        var nearest = $('.block-nearest-delivery');

        if(nearest.hasClass('unloaded')){
            $.nette.ajax("\/silvestr-na-kosiku?do=orderSlotPreview-load").done(function(){
                nearest.removeClass('unloaded')
            });
        }
    })
</script>

	<script async>
		basic.documentReady(function () {

			if (window.innerWidth > 1024) {
				$('#delete-cart-items').on('click', function (e) {
					var message = confirm('Opravdu chcete vyprázdnit váš košík?')

					if (!message)
						e.preventDefault();
					else
						$.nette.ajax(this.dataset.href);
				});
			}
		});
	</script>
</div></div></div>
<script async>
	basic.documentReady(function(){
		fixing.init();
	});

	$(document).ajaxComplete(function(){
		fixing.reinitElements(true);
	});
</script>

						<div class="recipe-item">
							<div class="recipe-item-content">
								<div class="text-wrapper">
									<h3>Nealko a snack</h3>
									<div class="recipe-item-text">
										<strong>Nezapomínejte na jídlo a na hydrataci</strong>
										Pokud chcete na oslavu vzpomínat v dobrém, nezapomeňte se pravidelně hydratovat vodou a nealkoholickým pitím. Zmírníte tím případnou kocovinu. Pomáhá také vydatné jídlo, tudíž se nestyďte a dopřejte si tolik chlebíčků a dobrot, kolik hrdlo ráčí. Na výčitky bude čas příští rok.
									</div>
									<a href="https://www.kosik.cz/hledat?q=Silvestr_2017" class="button-simple button-red button-smaller">Celá nabídka</a>

	<script type="text/javascript">
        $('a[href^="#"]').on('click', function() {
            $('html, body').animate({
                scrollTop: $($(this).attr('href')).offset().top - 40
            }, 2000);
            return false;
        });
	</script>


	<script async>
        $(document).ready(function () {
            var isOpen = $('body').hasClass('show');

            $('.region-recipes-makeYourself-carousel-inner .recipes-carousel').not('.slick-initialized').slick({
                dots: true,
                dotsClass: 'slick-dots slick-dots-hp',
                infinite: true,
                slidesToShow: 1,
                slidesToScroll: 1,
                speed: 700,
            });

            $('.zone-microsite .basic-recomendation .recomendation-carousel-inner').slick({
                infinite: true,
                speed: 700,
                slidesToShow: isOpen ? 4 : 5,
                slidesToScroll: isOpen ? 4 : 5,
                responsive: [
                    {
                        breakpoint: 1025,
                        settings: {
                            slidesToShow: 4,
                            swipeToSlide: true
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        breakpoint: 769,
                        settings: {
                            slidesToShow: 3,
                            swipeToSlide: true
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        breakpoint: 560,
                        settings: {
                            slidesToShow: 2,
                            swipeToSlide: false,
                            slidesToScroll: 2,
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        breakpoint: 360,
                        settings: {
                            slidesToShow: 1,
                            slidesToScroll: 1
                        }
                    }
                ]
            });

            fixing.onClose(function () {
                $('.zone-microsite .basic-recomendation .recomendation-carousel-inner').slick('slickSetOption', 'slidesToShow', 5, true);
                $('.recipes-carousel').slick('slickSetOption', 'slidesToShow', 1, true);
            });

            fixing.onOpen(function () {
                $('.zone-microsite .basic-recomendation .recomendation-carousel-inner').slick('slickSetOption', 'slidesToShow', 4, true);
                $('.recipes-carousel').slick('slickSetOption', 'slidesToShow', 1, true);
            });

            $('.region-tabs-carousel .tab-carousel').click(function () {
                var block = $(this).data('tab');
                $('#' + block).siblings().removeClass('active');
                $('#' + block).addClass('active');
            });
        });

	</script>
		</div>

					</div>
				</div>

			</div>
		</section>

    $(".signup-email").on("focus", function() {
    	window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
	    window.dataLayer.push({
		    'event': 'ga.event',
		    'eCategory': 'User',
		    'eAction': 'Registration',
		    'eLabel': 'Start',
		    'eValue': 1,
		    'eNonInteractionHit': true,
		    'eventCallback' : function() {
			    window.dataLayer.push({
				    'eCategory': undefined,
				    'eAction': undefined,
				    'eLabel': undefined,
				    'eValue': undefined,
				    'eNonInteractionHit': false
			    });
		    }
	    });
    })

                        isMobile = /ios|android|webos/.test(platformName);
